title: Carbene catalyzed synthesis of fluorophosphate cathode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00983E, Paper
Qingfeng Fu, Wang Zhou, Peng Gao, Hongliang Dong, Shi Chen, Chang-ling Fan, Jilei Liu
Fluorophosphate compounds are an important class of cathode materials, however, the one-step synthesis of phase-pure fluorophosphate compounds in a well-controlled manner remains challenging due to ease volatilization of fluorine during...
